title: Aatrox rework, Face it hes been bad for a while
body:
So here's my Aatrox rework that i thought of when i couldn't sleep last night. {{champion:266}} 

His Passive: Tides of War
Aatrox gains % Damage based on how low he is based on level 0.5/1/1.5/2% per missing % hp. Ranks up with his ult.

Q: Puncture

Aatrox impales a target dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.6 Bonus AD) physical damage and slowing his opponent by 5/10/15/20/25% for 2 seconds.
Passive Aatrox has 2/4/6/8/10% Armour Pen. Also an Auto Attack reset.

W: (Need a name)
Aatrox pulls in the blood of his enemies dealing 90/110/130/150/170 (0.4 Ability power) Magic damage, healing himself for half the damage
dealt, but weakening himself in the process reducing his AD by 10/20/30/40/50.
Passive: Whenever Aatrox kills an enemy champion he heals for 2% of their max hp.

E: (Need a name)
Aatrox slams his sword underneath an enemy unit knocking it up for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds dealing 90/105/120/135/150 (0.4 bonus AD) physical damage.

R: A Darkins will.
*Can only be cast when below 33% hp*
Aatrox gains 25/30/25% damage reduction, 25/30/35% Attack speed and 30/40/50 Attack damage.

Aatrox is a Off-tank top laner with great sustain and sustained damage.
Recommended items: {{item:3071}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} {{item:1316}} {{item:3153}} 
Tell me what you think and/or how I can improve this

replies.body: you say he's bad but if the meta ever goes split push he will be king of top

But thats just trynd being op and your laner being bad lmao, you can legit do that with trynd against any level 1

With some attack speed aatrox becomes broken, i play him in the jungle with devourer, hes actually really good lol

yea ive played some aatrox jungle with devourer too but he aint that good, other junglers have faster clears such as udyr, yi, etc with higher sustain fiddle ww yorick even and better ganks, elise lee sin kha zix etc and tryn aint that op he has plenty of counters such as red smite thornmail ignite kiting pushing lanes while he tries to split :)

Aatrox's strength is always having map presence since he sustains and clears super fast, probably the best clearer in the game. Faster than yi with more sustain since he doesn't use mana, faster clears than ww, faster clears than fiddle, every other jungler he out sustains. I used to be able to do a full clear including dragon and rift herald, while also picking up a few kills on ganks. He's a monster before 10 mins and if you get sated before 20 you'll be unstoppable. But devourer is getting rotated out now so he's not going to be viable anywhere lol

Q slow is pathetic. Also the armour pen is weak. Maybe change it to Aatrox does %max hp damage scaling from his health since you want him to be tanky.
